duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support communications related to billing and payment inquiries, addressing client issues and questions in a timely manner.
Collaborate with teams to ensure accurate order entry and completion of service orders.
Review and research client data to resolve concerns and issues, identify discrepancies and request corrections.
Audit and update billing and CRM client data to ensure synchronous databases for reporting.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree in business or a related field
